text: Tumi ki dekha na ye allah akasa theke pani barsana karena, tarapara take matite srotarupe prabahita karena, tarapara tara dbara tini utpadana karena gachapala yadera barna bibidha dharanera, tarapara ta sukiye yaya, phale tumi take halade haye yete dekhate pa'o, tarapara tini take khara kuto baniye phelena. Nihsandeha ete to upadesa rayeche bodhasakti-sampannadera jan'ya.
